chibi.config.title: Chibi Settings
chibi.config.ign_display.tooltip: Displays your username when you use third-person cameras.
chibi.config.waving.tooltip: Swinging your hand for no reason may trigger anti-cheats.
chibi.config.waving.keys: Keybinds are set in the vanilla options.
chibi.config.akimbo.tooltip: Holding two identical items in your hands will let you "use" both.
chibi.config.straferunning.tooltip: Running diagonally is approx. 1.4 times faster.
chibi.config.save_anywhere.tooltip: Save your hotbar outside creative mode.
chibi.config.tooltip.dont_cheat: This feature may be considered cheating.
chibi.config.tooltip.wip: This feature is a work in progress, and is buggy.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.chibi: This mod is a test bed for features, experiments, or other stuff that may not be 100%% in the green. If you play on a multiplayer server, please check with moderators which features are allowed by the server rules.
